# oldKey

**Type Property**

If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/old] was specified when the observer was registered, the value of this key is the value before the attribute was changed.

## Declaration

```swift
static let oldKey: NSKeyValueChangeKey
```

## Discussion

For [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/removal] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/replacement], if [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/old] was specified when the observer was registered, the value is an `NSArray` instance that contains the objects that have been removed or have been replaced by other objects, respectively.

## Type Properties

- **indexesKey**: If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/insertion], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/removal], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/replacement], the value of this key is an `NSIndexSet` object that contains the indexes of the inserted, removed, or replaced objects.
- **kindKey**: An `NSNumber` object that contains a value corresponding to one of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange] enums, indicating what sort of change has occurred.
- **newKey**: If the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChangeKey/kindKey] entry is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueChange/setting], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/new] was specified when the observer was registered, the value of this key is the new value for the attribute.
- **notificationIsPriorKey**: If the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyValueObservingOptions/prior] option was specified when the observer was registered this notification is sent prior to a change.
